extendedInfo.description: The 3D Issue App is a great way of reading, exploring and downloading 3D Issue digital magazines on your Android device. 3D Issue digital magazines can be downloaded to the app and then viewed at any time, any place, even without an internet connection. The 3D Issue App allows readers to save publications which have been enhanced with rich media, video, audio and links providing a unique reading experience. The 3D Issue App provides: - HTML5 page flip magazine view - Download for offline viewing - Portrait and landscape view - Zoom to larger view - Rich media elements; audio, video incl. YouTube integration, web and email links - Share via social networks: Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and email - Search for key words or phrases - Change viewing settings - Add bookmarksPlease note - this app is compatible with publications created using 3D Issue version 6 (and higher) only.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t open...
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work. Keep getting an error message the app has unfortunately stopped... 8
reviews.author: Don Sumner

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Lets me view the 3D Issue digital editions offline, when i want them. Easy to use and straight forward!
reviews.author: Heather Walker

reviews.title: Not worth the time
reviews.comment: Formatting it to look like a virtual mag Is a neat idea but results in a default text size that can\'t be read. It takes forever to load and crashes frequently. To put my complaint in to context I have been an android user for 4 years now and have never felt the need to leave feedback until I encountereed this piece of junk....worst reading app ever!
reviews.author: Michael Galea

reviews.title: I want this to work!!!
reviews.comment: Flakey no zoom to read text and slow.
reviews.author: Rob Pearson

reviews.title: Bad U I
reviews.comment: No menus or instructions on how to make this work!
reviews.author: Rick Willey

reviews.comment: Will not even start. Just keeps saying that 3d issue has stopped. Crappy app
reviews.author: Christopher Sokolowski

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Very buggy. An not able to get this to work. Very unuserfriendly.
reviews.author: Guy Pause
